attributes.action: STOP  the closure of The Moakes medical centre Luton, this January 2017.
attributes.background: Married and a mother of three children. Teaching Assitant  in a special needs school for 9 years. A moakes patient. A member of our community.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. While the Government is ultimately responsible for the NHS and accountable to Parliament, the day to day operational decisions are a matter for NHS England. You can contact NHS England using the details on the following website: https://www.england.nhs.uk/contact-us/

However you could create a petition about the need to ensure good local coverage of NHS services, using the closure the Moakes medical center as an example.
